Karakawei: Alas, our chief, Mushika, should have never begun the exploration. His arrogance aroused the wrath of our ancestors and brought on his illness. But Shilen has promised that Mushika would not perish, and will soon recover to help save the Elroki tribe. The key to his recovery lies in your willingness, fated outsider, to help our people. Wait! One of my departed ancestors wishes to speak with you through me.
